column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This premier Chicago museum is famous for its French Impressionism collection
column2: but that's definitely not the only notable sections of its vast permanent exhibits. While you should still admire the masterpieces from Van Gogh and Monet
column3: you must also explore the other sections of the museums! To name a few
column4: you will find an expansive Hellenistic collection spanning the its whole time frame
column5: an impressive Asian collection with enough works to fill a grand temple
column6: and an awesome European weapon collection befitting for an army. Regardless of your art tastes and preferences
column7: you will certainly find at least a section that fits you perfectly!
